@Bariiiiiq Hi! Recipe for carrot halwa. it takes long to cook but tastes great.

Milk 1 litre
Peeled and grated red carrots 1 kg
Sugar 250 gms 
Ghee 250 gms
Egg 2 eggs
Wash grated carrots &in a pot with a tbsp of ghee on low heat, cook wet carrots gently, let them steam till carrots soften
